resources.string_upd:
This module can be used to login to the site using LinkedIn credentials.

To make it work:

  • Create LinkedIn app
  • Add the following Authorized redirect URLs for your app in Auth section: {0}
  • Add Sign In with LinkedIn using OpenID Connect product in Products section
  • Get generated Client ID & Secret pair from Auth section then enter these details in this module settings.
